scripts.build:tauri-plugin-holochain-service: npm run build:holochain_runtime_uniffi && cd crates/tauri-plugin-holochain-service && npm run build
scripts.start: cd examples/end-user-happ && nix develop --command bash -c "npm run tauri dev"
scripts.android:start: cd examples/end-user-happ && nix develop .#androidDev --command bash -c "npm run tauri android dev"
